ActNational Energy Board Act
PrecisApproval for the issuance to EMERA BRUNSWICK PIPELINE COMPANY LTD. of a Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity (No. GC-110) for the construction of a pipeline connecting the Canaport Liquefied Natural Gas terminal at Mispec Point, New Brunswick, to the U.S. portion of the Maritimes and Northeast Pipeline near St. Stephen, New Brunswick.
